title: Report Material Scrap
description: A machine operator needs to report a quantity of raw material that was scrapped during a production run due to a defect.

tasks.description: Identify the work order and the specific material part number being scrapped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the active work order and the material from the BOM.

tasks.description: Record the quantity of scrapped material and select a reason code for the scrap.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the correct quantity and selects 'Material Defect' as the reason.

tasks.description: Confirm that the inventory levels for the material have been updated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the system shows the reduced quantity of the material.
